TitlePage.Title: &Digraphs;
TitlePage.Subtitle: Methods for digraphs
TitlePage.Author: Jan De Beule jdebeule@cage.ugent.be http://homepages.vub.ac.be/~jdbeule/
Julius Jonušas jj252@st-and.ac.uk http://www-circa.mcs.st-and.ac.uk/~julius
James D. Mitchell jdm3@st-and.ac.uk http://tinyurl.com/jdmitchell
Michael Torpey mct25@st-and.ac.uk http://www-circa.mcs.st-and.ac.uk/~mct25
Wilf Wilson waw7@st-and.ac.uk http://www-circa.mcs.st-and.ac.uk/~waw7

TitlePage.Abstract: The &Digraphs; package is a &GAP; package containing methods for graphs, digraphs, and multidigraphs.
TitlePage.Acknowledgements:
We would like to thank Chris Jefferson for his help in including the &bliss; tool in the package.
This package's methods for computing digraph homomorphisms are based on work by Max Neunhöffer, and independently Artur Schäfer.
